column4: I'm a complete newbie to ubuntu and am having two problems.  I have an external hard drive that I can not seem to find (it's NTFS) and I would like to view my windows file (dual booting with Vista)
click on top or bottom panel and add to panel disk mounter
with a little luck your drive should pop up on the panel and you can mount it
it might take a reboot/ log out  before it works
